name: New Dawn (itch)
description:
This is the first RPG Maker project  I've ever actually gotten serious with. I've still got a lot to learn, but I hope you'll give the New Dawn (for lack of a better name) demo and me a chance!

Planned updates (as of 12/5/2018):

1) Gender selection

2) Tweaks/fixes to game assets and details

3) More things to do in the training room
